PrimeText:
While making decisions during the blocks in which you're presented with one of the names you typed,



Press SPACE to continue.
ImagineText: please imagine that person is in the room with you.

PrimeText:
While making decisions during the blocks in which you're presented with one of the words you typed,



Press SPACE to continue.
ImagineText: please think of what that word means to you.

PrimeText:
During the blocks in which you see the word 'Choice',



Press SPACE to continue.
ImagineText: please make your decisions as you normally would without additional considerations.
